description: Strategic Planning and Implementation to Address HIV&AID in Nigeria (Cross River & Sokoto States)

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities to mainstream action into national policies, plans and strategies on the socio-economic causes and consequences of HIV and the linkage to the health MDG
subproject.description:
The Objective of the project under the 6th Country Programme was to support the country in strengthening evidence based planning and implementation of HIV and AIDS responses at the Federal and state levels in Nigera. It consists of planning, budgeting and coordination for implementation: Major outputs are: 
1. State and Local government trained for participatory preparation of  their Poverty Resuction Strategy Papers ( PRSPS): The State and Local Government Economic Empowerment Strategy ( SEEDS and LEEDS) 
2. Supporting stakeholders to put HIV and AIDS responses at the core of develoment planning
3. Supporting decentralized strategic and operational planning for HIV and AIDS responses
4. Strenghtening implementation and management capacity using the UNDP Capacity Develompent Approach 
The project has been operationaly and finacially closed.
subproject.title: HIV Response Planning & Imp.
